item.description:
• Please support my friends at Courageous Sailling with their Annual Fund Raiser Cocktail Event. www.courageoussailing.org

  • Join us at Sail Loft for another great cocktails event to help support Courageous Sailing as we get ready to kick-off the 2012 season. You love cocktails and you love Courageous, so come on by!

    Cover:
    *$15 in advance - pay for your entry now!
    https://www.paypal.com/ cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=8MVLGYXSZ38KN

    *$20 at the door

    As always there will be free appetizers, and this time get your tickets for a chance to win a free pair of Sperry Top-Siders or $100 to the Navy Yard Bistro.

    Prize tickets are 5 for $10
    https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=UVKQCJK8VRFU2

    or 15 for $20
    https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=DHVBENDHN5E9S

Â
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a white sailor's hat.
item.name: Cocktails for Courageous
